author: Russell Brand
description:
Britain is becoming a powder keg. From flag protests and migrant clashes to Palestine bans and absurd arrests over bacon chants, the signs of social collapse are everywhere. COVID exposed how easily freedoms can be suspended, and now the fallout—economic decline, political betrayal, and manipulated division—is erupting in the streets. The establishment response isn’t unity but censorship, authoritarian laws, and the criminalization of dissent. Unless real decentralization and community power take root, Britain faces unrest, repression, and the slow implosion of a once-united nation.

[UNPACKED]

title: England is about to ERUPT!
